Hi! I'm brae :)

Nov. 11, 2019

Welcome to my website! Here I put everything that interests me, which is a lot! I'm an interdisciplinary researcher and a MSc. Candidate in Computer Science working in the field of automated music composition. My interest in music comes from over a decade of playing classical guitar, some bass guitar, and very recently piano. I also have been creating playable maps for years with Valve's Hammer Tool.

I post all of my creations here — and I suppose my algorithm's creations as well ;p.

Let me know what you think!
